NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
Dr. Harry Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB
July 13, 1959
14 Gregory Hall ‘ t
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I think that the NAEB should definitely participate in the
acitivity of the International Association for Mass Communication
Research which you wrote about. First of all, I think it important
that an organization in the United States cooperate in these inter¬
national ventures. Secondly, it seems to me that the bibliographical
material will prove of tremendous benefit to educational broadcasters
and broadcast researchers in this country.
I would think that it might be well to have one member of the
research committee representing the NAEB in each of the five sections
of the International Association. If you think this is all right, I
can write to some of the members and see if they are interested.
Meanwhile, I will write to Terrou, of the Association, and get
further details on how we might participate, cost of the documentation
cards, how and when bibliographical items shouHbe sent. We can then
notify all members of the NAEB in the newsletter to feed items in —
any of their research projects or other materials which are suitable --
to a central place. This also could well be the function of one member
of the research committee. Actually, if people send it in proper form,
the chairman of the committee could handle this quite easily. Anyway,
I will let you know when I get details from this fellow in Italy.
Marshall McLuhan was through the other night -- spent the night
in Iowa City while en route to the West coast. For the first time, I
believe I have some idea of what it is he really plans to do. Some¬
how, this simply does not get communicated in his letters. As you can
imagine, it was an interesting evening. He does not agree with me
but I am now not at all sure that he could not sit down for six months
and write the report which he plans to wind up with after talking to
people here and there for a year or so. I also explained my suggestion
